The monster took Quickstrike on his shoulder like a sack and ran
through the door, crouching to fit the opening and throwing the guards
aside.

???: FUN!!! WHERE NOW?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "err.." He thought for a second.  
> "Out that way?" He pointed towards the door.
> "But put me on your back first." He instructed.
